title: Ozone Therapy Offers a Multitude of Benefits to Your Health
description: Ozone Therapy offers a multitude of benefits to your body, such as the treatment of various diseases and in return, your quality of life.
sitename: AMA Regenerative Medicine & Skincare - Regenerative Medicine Division
cleaned_text: Just as we watch technology evolve at a rapid pace year after year, so too does the discovery of ways you can treat and nourish your body to boost your maximum health potential. One of those ways is with ozone therapy. Watch the video : What is ozone therapy? In addition to our [High Potency IV Therapies](https://amaregenmed.com/treatments/integrative-and-regenerative-iv-therapy/), Ozone Therapy offers a multitude of benefits to your body and in return your quality of life. What is Ozone Therapy? Ozone therapy involves introducing the Ozone molecules in specific ways to our body. The most common method is mixing it with our blood in an IV and reintroducing our ozonized blood back into our body. What is Ozone? Ozone is a naturally occurring element found in our atmosphere. The ozone molecule (O3) contains three oxygen atoms whereas the oxygen molecule (O2) contains only two. Therefore, Ozone is a form of oxygen and can be produced by special technology in a doctor's office. History of Medical Ozone Despite its dubious status in the USA as an "alternative" treatment, [for the past 150 years](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3312702/#sec1-2title) Ozone Therapy has been thoroughly studied and widely utilized throughout Europe and Asia. For US patients who encounter it for the first time it's an interesting and curious treatment, because it seems so simple, natural and effective, that one wonders why so few US doctors use it. As a matter of fact, even though it is statistically one of the safest medical treatments known, until relatively recently, Ozone Therapy was illegal in many states, and patients had to travel to Mexico to find American doctors who practiced "Integrative Medicine" and whose specialization included Ozone Therapy. The reasons for this negativity and resistance to ozone in the US are entirely political and commercial, (as many disruptive innovations encounter), and have nothing to do with what is good for patient care.... But this is a subject for another article. Our Introduction to Ozone Therapy At AMA Regenerative Medicine, we were introduced to Ozone Therapy by some of our patients who had been healed from [various devastating cancers](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZqSLH1re4W0) and microbial infections by American Integrative MD's who had moved their offices to Mexico. Their stories were so compelling that we traveled with them to these clinics to learn firsthand about the mysterious ozone treatments. Thereafter, having validated their amazing recoveries with our own eyes, we traveled to Italy, the world's center for ozone studies, to study Ozone Therapy with renowned global experts. It was [there in Italy that we learned about Ozone Therapy](https://edisciplinas.usp.br/pluginfile.php/5803895/mod_folder/content/0/2020%20Declaracio%CC%81n-de-Madrid_EN-7.pdf) and how it is extremely effective in patients who are suffering from a wide variety of chronic microbial infections, fungal (yeast) such as [Candida](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5763895/), Bacterial infections such as Spirochetes and Lyme Disease, [MRSA infections](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5783482/) and viruses such as Epstein Barr, [Herpes](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/7187109) (Simplex & Shingles), [HIV and even Ebola](https://bornclinic.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/OZONE-THERAPY.pdf), as well as a whole host of inflammatory diseases. The Benefits of Ozone Therapy Just a few of the many established beneficial effects of Ozone Therapy include: [Dental caries](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/15241911/) (cavities), decreased blood cholesterol, increases red blood cell metabolism, increases oxygenation of tissues, increases mitochondrial production of ATP, preserves tissues suffering from hypoxic and ischemic conditions, and accelerates wound healing. Ozone Therapy comes with a long list of benefits as a [complimentary medical approach](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/26687830) in the treatment of various Sclerosis](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7233748/) [Arthritis](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/28738079) - Heart Disease [Lyme Disease](https://amaregenmed.com/treatments/chronic-lyme-disease-treatment/) - Autoimmune Disease Additional Health Benefits Include - Anti-Aging - Boost of the immune system - Increased energy production in your cells [Reduces the oxidation of your body](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/29152215) - Reduces the level of acidity of your body - Kills bacteria and viruses - Stimulates white blood cell production - Fights infections Benefits from a Scientific Perspective From a scientific perspective ozone: [Stimulates mitochondrial function](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35880042/)and causes an increase in mitochondrial numbers within every cell in your body. This results in a remarkable stimulation of the regenerative capacity and activity in every organ, tissue and gland in your body. - Increases the metabolism of your red blood cells (glycolytic ATP) - Increases blood flow (perfusion) throughout your entire body (nitric oxide) - Increases oxygen delivery to all your tissues. (2,3,DPG) - Boosts your immune system - Increases production of Interferons... which are your body's prime defense against viruses - Directly attacks the viral capsid ... "shell" of all viruses... killing them - Causes an increase in the generation and release of growth factors (from platelets), which helps healing and regeneration of damaged tissues. Ozone increases your body's production of natural anti-oxidant molecules that protect you from oxidative stress and damage. (Up-regulation / Gene Modulation) Benefits from a Clinical Perspective From the clinical perspective ozone: - Kills pathogenic bacteria and viruses, including - Lyme (and co-infections) - Candida [Viral infections](https://amaregenmed.com/articles/articles-on-long-covid/)like Herpes, HIV, Epstein-Bar and Hepatitis - fungal infections. - Boosts the immune system - Stimulates a Powerful antioxidant response - Effective [treatment of chronic sinus infections](https://amaregenmed.com/articles-ozone-therapy/ozone-therapy-patient-success-stories/) - Stimulates healing as well as regenerates damaged joints - Helps heal brain trauma including seizures - Effective on many skin conditions, including hard to heal wounds, ulcers and even MRSA - Effective on soft tissue injuries and trigger points - Effective on improving vision and curing ocular (eye) diseases such as Macular Degeneration, Diabetes related blindness etc. - Decreases cholesterol Since ozone therapy is so powerful in helping to heal infected wounds, or wounds in general, cutting edge dental practices and periodontists rely on it during procedures and surgeries, where this is becoming more popular. How Ozone is Administered As the clinical evidence for the effectiveness of Ozone therapy is gaining recognition, there are now several clinics throughout the country that are having remarkable results treating chronic complex infections, like Lyme and various viral infections with ozone. Intravenous (IV) Ozone The preferred method of administering ozone therapy is intensive intravenous (IV) ozone protocols. The most effective of these therapies is Hyperbaric Ozone Therapy with the Hermann device, also known as "Ten Pass" Ozone Therapy or High Dose Ozone Therapy. Watch the video : Why IV Ozone Therapy "The Ten Pass Device" is the Most Effective Most clinics combine ozone IV therapy with high potency vitamin IV therapy, for a synergistically fabulous impact on your overall health and wellbeing. Ozone Injections Ozone can be injected directly into joints and soft tissues. Topical Ozone Though Ozone is powerfully effective when administered as an IV, It has a similar effect when applied internally or topically in the form of ozonated oils such as olive oil. (Nikola Tesla was the first to develop these medicinal oils for physicians). Water can also be ozonated for drinking and bathing in. Limb Bagging Ozone gas, at precise concentrations, can be infused into a bag that is encapsulating a limb, ("limb bagging"), or used in ozone saunas. Ozone Insufflation Ozone can be infused directly into body cavities, called "insufflation". (Rectal/colon, vaginal, ears, sinuses, bladder.) The Results of Ozone Therapy In each of these cases, the ozone treats localized infections, and supports an accelerated healing of the inflamed tissue. Bottom line, ozone therapy is safe, natural and works physiologically to eradicate all sorts of infections and boost your overall health and wellbeing. Bottom line, Ozone Therapy is safe, natural, and works biologically to eliminate infections and improve overall health and well-being. Here are a few examples of Ozone Therapy success stories. The ozone treatments have been a miracle for me." Ozone Therapy FAQs Q. Can ozone treatments help with Avascular Necrosis? A. A combination of Hyperbaric Ozone Therapy and [Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy](https://amaregenmed.com/services/hyperbaric-oxygen-therapy/) has an excellent chance of stimulating significant healing of your AVN. The regeneration of damaged tissue is stimulated and by both therapies. Also, your native stem cells, which are at the heart of your situation, are known to be stimulated by Hyperbaric Ozone Therapy. Q. Is Ozone Therapy good for Arthritis? A. Yes, Ozone Therapy is fantastic for arthritis. Ozone causes the reduction of pain and inflammation, and stimulates regeneration, when [injected directly into an arthritic joint](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5524330/). When ozone is infused into the blood, for those with rheumatoid arthritis, it reduces the systemic inflammation throughout the body that is caused by the autoimmune disease. Q. Is Ozone Therapy beneficial for autoimmune diseases such as Hashimoto's disease? A. Ozone Therapy is very beneficial. Multiple treatments will be needed. Ongoing maintenance treatments might be needed indefinitely depending on how severe your condition is. Q. Can ozone treatments help heal a herniated disc? A. Yes, ozone injections can be very healing for a herniated disk injury. Ozone stimulates the bodies natural regenerative processes and also reduces inflammation. To encourage regeneration of the damaged tissue, most doctors with experience in ozone medicine will include specific vitamins and cellular nutrients along with the ozone. The injections themselves are typically painless. The most uncomfortable part of the procedure is the prick of the needle. In the case of [ozone injections into a joint](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L0LCnB85F5Q&t=1s), the pain disappears almost immediately. This is because an anesthetic is included in the formulation. Once the anesthetic has worn off, the pain is typically greatly diminished due to the effects of the ozone. Following the injection, it is important not to over exert yourself for a few days. Be patient as the healing response of your physiology takes hold of healing the herniated disc. Natural healing is not a "transaction", it is a process that needs to take its natural course. To maximize the healing, your herniated disk may require 3 to 5 strategically timed injections. Q. Can Ozone Therapy help someone who is ill and in pain from taking an antibiotic like Cipro? A. Yes, the ozone will help quite a bit but you will also need to detox from the effects of the Cipro. There are Naturopathic doctors and Integrative doctors who are experts in this type of detox work. I am sure you can find one in your area. [Quicksilver Scientific](https://www.quicksilverscientific.com/) has the best detox protocols I have ever encountered. Q. I've always heard that it's dangerous to have gas bubbles in the blood stream. Do you inject the ozone directly into the muscle? A. Yes, it is a bad idea to have bubbles in the blood stream. This is something that never happens when Ozone Therapy is administered in the standard way. A precise amount of blood is drained from the patient similar to giving blood. That blood is then infused with ozone and every drop of the patients blood is then dripped back into their body. Statistically, Ozone Therapies are the safest medical treatment in history. Millions of these treatments are performed every year all over the world without any negative occurrences or serious incidents. Q. Will Ozone Therapy help with Fibromyalgia? A. Yes, in our experience [Ozone Therapy can help fibromyalgia](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31575841/). Q. Can Ozone Therapy help someone with herpes? How many treatments would I need? A. Yes, Ozone Therapy is a powerful stimulant of your immune system, As such it can help very much against all sorts of viruses. We have many patients with hepatitis and herpes who are having excellent results. The protocol needed is different for each patient depending on the severity of their symptoms. Generally, patients start with 2-3 treatments per week for 4-6 weeks, and then, as they get better, we slowly reduce the treatments to once per week, then every other week, down to once per month. Q. I am interested in ozone injections for a damaged joint. How do the injections work? A. To encourage the [healing of a damaged joint](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L0LCnB85F5Q) we use 4 modalities together: - Ozone gas, which reduces inflammation and stimulates [collagen](https://amaregenmed.com/what-is-collagen-basic-biology/)regeneration - Clot Matrix, which is a fibrin clot derived from a small amount of the patient's blood, which is especially rich in platelets. These platelets are cells that store all sorts of biochemical mediators that stimulate healing and regeneration. - A special mix of vitamins that are required for the generation of new healthy tissue [Procaine](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Procaine), which anesthetizes the joint, making the procedure comfortable. It also breaks the pain cycle. Q. How is the 10 pass ozone device different from using a higher quantity ozone at a higher gamma? A. Ozone Therapy is very much dose dependent and the blood can only handle a specific concentration of ozone at one time. The goal is to get the optimum quantity of ozone into the patient's blood. However, the ozone can not be administered directly into the patient's vein. Also, you can't use too much ozone to over saturate a specific quantity of blood all at one time. Therefore, administering ozone of the correct concentration into a measured quantity of blood and re-infusing the blood back into the patient is the only other option. This is repeated until the overall volume of the patient's blood has been infused with the optimal quantity of ozone. This is know as High Dose Ozone Therapy or HDOT. When done correctly, the therapeutic value of High Dose Ozone Therapy is stunning! Q. Can the 10 pass Ozone Therapy help patients with Multiple Sclerosis? A. Yes. High Dose Ozone Therapy (HDOT) is known to be an effective treatment to increase mitochondrial function, reduce systemic inflammation and to stimulate the activity of native stem cells. All three of these are important for [treating multiple sclerosis](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5674660/). Q. Can ozone injections help with a torn ACL? A. If the ACL is NOT torn all they way through then ozone injections can help. Ozone injections are a very effective regenerative treatment that can definitely help a knee with a compromised ACL.
